actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to more fairly apportion between foreign and domestic sources interest attributable to enviromental control assets.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide, for income tax purposes, for the allocation of interest expense attributable to environmental control assets.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to more fairly apportion between foreign and domestic sources interest attributable to enviromental control assets.
